newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-CAGLIARI'S DANISH DEFENDER OUT FOR TWO WEEKS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-CAGLIARI'S DANISH DEFENDER OUT FOR TWO WEEKS.

text.p: Cagliari's Danish defender Christian Loenstrup will miss at least two league matches after suffering a hard blow to a kidney in Thursday's Italian Cup tie with Internazionale.
Veteran trainer Carlo Mazzone said on Friday that blood had been found in urine Loenstrup gave for an anti-doping test following the 2-2 draw.
He was immediately taken to hospital where he was diagnosed with an injury to his left renal cavity.
